verses.verse: וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <WH3427> vai-Ye-shev dwelt יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko, And Jacob בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land מְגוּרֵ֣י <WH4033> me-gu-Rei was a stranger אָבִ֑יו <WH1> 'a-Viv; wherein his father בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> ke-Na-'an. of Canaan

אֵ֣לֶּה׀ <WH428> 'El-leh These תֹּלְד֣וֹת <WH8435> to-le-Dot These [are] the generations יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko, of Jacob יוֹסֵ֞ף <WH3130> yo-Sef Joseph בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- old שְׁבַֽע־ <WH7651> she-va'- seven עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה <WH6240> 'es-Reh teen שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> sha-Nah years הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> ha-Yah become רֹעֶ֤ה <WH7462> ro-'Eh was feeding אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with אֶחָיו֙ <WH251> 'e-Chav with his brethren בַּצֹּ֔אן <WH6629> batz-Tzon, the flock וְה֣וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu he נַ֗עַר <WH5288> Na-'ar, and the lad אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei [was] with the sons בִלְהָ֛ה <WH1090> vil-Hah of Bilhah וְאֶת־ <WH854> ve-'Et for בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei and with the sons זִלְפָּ֖ה <WH2153> zil-Pah of Zilpah נְשֵׁ֣י <WH802> ne-Shei wives אָבִ֑יו <WH1> 'a-Viv; his father's וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> vai-ya-Ve brought יוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> yo-Sef and Joseph אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דִּבָּתָ֥ם <WH1681> dib-ba-Tam report רָעָ֖ה <WH7451> ra-'Ah their evil אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about אֲבִיהֶֽם׃ <WH1> 'a-vi-Hem. unto his father

וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> ve-Yis-ra-'El, Now Israel אָהַ֤ב <WH157> 'a-Hav loved אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> yo-Sef Joseph מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol all בָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> ba-Nav, more than all his children כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- because בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- because he [was] the son זְקֻנִ֥ים <WH2208> ze-ku-Nim of his old age ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu he ל֑וֹ lo; וְעָ֥שָׂה <WH6213> ve-'A-sah and he made ל֖וֹ lo כְּתֹ֥נֶת <WH3801> ke-To-net him a coat פַּסִּֽים׃ <WH6446> pas-Sim. of [many] colours

וַיִּרְא֣וּ <WH7200> vai-yir-'U saw אֶחָ֗יו <WH251> 'e-Chav, And when his brethren כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אֹת֞וֹ <WH853> o-To אָהַ֤ב <WH157> 'a-Hav loved אֲבִיהֶם֙ <WH1> 'a-vi-Hem that their father מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol all אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> 'e-Chav, him more than all his brethren וַֽיִּשְׂנְא֖וּ <WH8130> vai-yis-ne-'U they hated אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> o-To; וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo not יָכְל֖וּ <WH3201> ya-che-Lu him and could דַּבְּר֥וֹ <WH1696> dab-be-Ro not speak לְשָׁלֹֽם׃ <WH7965> le-sha-Lom. peaceably

וַיַּחֲלֹ֤ם <WH2492> vai-ya-cha-Lom dreamed יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> yo-Sef And Joseph חֲל֔וֹם <WH2472> cha-Lom, a dream וַיַּגֵּ֖ד <WH5046> vai-yag-Ged and he told לְאֶחָ֑יו <WH251> le-'e-Chav; [it] his brethren וַיּוֹסִ֥פוּ <WH3254> vai-yo-Si-fu him yet the more ע֖וֹד <WH5750> od even שְׂנֹ֥א <WH8130> se-No and they hated אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853> o-To.

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem; about שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> shim-'u- unto them Hear נָ֕א <WH4994> na Please הַחֲל֥וֹם <WH2492> ha-cha-Lom which I have dreamed הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh to this אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which חָלָֽמְתִּי׃ <WH2492> cha-La-me-ti. have had

וְ֠הִנֵּה <WH2009> Ve-hin-neh behold אֲנַ֜חְנוּ <WH587> 'a-Nach-nu we מְאַלְּמִ֤ים <WH481> me-'al-le-Mim were binding אֲלֻמִּים֙ <WH485> 'a-lum-Mim sheaves בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch hope הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> has-sa-Deh, in the field וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and lo קָ֥מָה <WH6965> Ka-mah arose אֲלֻמָּתִ֖י <WH485> 'a-lum-ma-Ti and lo my sheaf וְגַם־ <WH1571> ve-gam- and also נִצָּ֑בָה <WH5324> nitz-Tza-vah; and also stood upright וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold תְסֻבֶּ֙ינָה֙ <WH5437> te-sub-Bei-nah stood round about אֲלֻמֹּ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH485> 'a-lum-Mo-tei-Chem, and behold your sheaves וַתִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֖יןָ <WH7812> vat-tish-ta-cha-Vei-na and made obeisance לַאֲלֻמָּתִֽי׃ <WH485> la-'a-lum-ma-Ti. to my sheaf

וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-ru said לוֹ֙ lo אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> 'e-Chav, And his brethren הֲמָלֹ֤ךְ <WH4427> ha-ma-Loch to him Shalt thou indeed תִּמְלֹךְ֙ <WH4427> tim-loCh reign עָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu, over אִם־ <WH518> 'im- Or מָשׁ֥וֹל <WH4910> ma-Shol over us;or shalt thou indeed תִּמְשֹׁ֖ל <WH4910> tim-Shol have dominion בָּ֑נוּ Ba-nu; וַיּוֹסִ֤פוּ <WH3254> vai-yo-Si-fu him yet the more עוֹד֙ <WH5750> 'Od even שְׂנֹ֣א <WH8130> se-No over us;And they hated אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> o-To, עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over חֲלֹמֹתָ֖יו <WH2472> cha-lo-mo-Tav for his dreams וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- over דְּבָרָֽיו׃ <WH1697> de-va-Rav. and for his words

וַיַּחֲלֹ֥ם <WH2492> vai-ya-cha-Lom And he dreamed עוֹד֙ <WH5750> 'Od still חֲל֣וֹם <WH2472> cha-Lom dream אַחֵ֔ר <WH312> 'a-Cher, yet another וַיְסַפֵּ֥ר <WH5608> vay-sap-Per and told אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To לְאֶחָ֑יו <WH251> le-'e-Chav; it his brethren וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer, and said הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Lo חָלַ֤מְתִּֽי <WH2492> cha-Lam-ti Behold I have dreamed חֲלוֹם֙ <WH2472> cha-lOm a dream ע֔וֹד <WH5750> od, still וְהִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold הַשֶּׁ֣מֶשׁ <WH8121> hash-She-mesh more and behold the sun וְהַיָּרֵ֗חַ <WH3394> ve-hai-ya-Re-ach, and the moon וְאַחַ֤ד <WH259> ve-'a-Chad a עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> 'a-Sar ten כּֽוֹכָבִ֔ים <WH3556> ko-cha-Vim, stars מִֽשְׁתַּחֲוִ֖ים <WH7812> mish-ta-cha-Vim made obeisance לִֽי׃ Li.

וַיְסַפֵּ֣ר <WH5608> vay-sap-Per And he told אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אָבִיו֮ <WH1> 'a-Viv [it] to his father וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and to אֶחָיו֒ <WH251> 'e-Chav and to his brethren וַיִּגְעַר־ <WH1605> vai-yig-'ar- rebuked בּ֣וֹ bo אָבִ֔יו <WH1> 'a-Viv, and his father וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer him and said ל֔וֹ lo, מָ֛ה <WH4100> mah What הַחֲל֥וֹם <WH2472> ha-cha-Lom unto him What [is] this dream הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh is this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that חָלָ֑מְתָּ <WH2492> cha-La-me-ta; that thou hast dreamed הֲב֣וֹא <WH935> ha-Vo indeed נָב֗וֹא <WH935> na-Vo, come אֲנִי֙ <WH589> 'a-Ni I וְאִמְּךָ֣ <WH517> ve-'im-me-Cha ;Shall I and thy mother וְאַחֶ֔יךָ <WH251> ve-'a-Chei-cha, and thy brethren לְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֥ת <WH7812> le-hish-ta-cha-Vot to bow down לְךָ֖ le-Cha אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> 'A-re-tzah. common

וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> vai-ye-le-Chu went אֶחָ֑יו <WH251> 'e-Chav; And his brethren לִרְע֛וֹת <WH7462> lir-'ot to feed אֶׅתׅ־ <WH853> 'et- צֹ֥אן <WH6629> tzon flock אֲבִיהֶ֖ם <WH1> 'a-vi-Hem their father's בִּשְׁכֶֽם׃ <WH7927> bish-Chem. in Shechem

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El And Israel אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יוֹסֵ֗ף <WH3130> yo-Sef, unto Joseph הֲל֤וֹא <WH3808> ha-Lo are not אַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH251> 'a-Chei-cha Do not thy brethren רֹעִ֣ים <WH7462> ro-'Im feed בִּשְׁכֶ֔ם <WH7927> bish-Chem, Shechem לְכָ֖ה <WH1980> le-Chah and I וְאֶשְׁלָחֲךָ֣ <WH7971> ve-'esh-la-cha-Cha and I will send thee אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem; to וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer unto them And he said ל֖וֹ lo הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2009> hin-Ne-ni. will go

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said ל֗וֹ lo, לֶךְ־ <WH1980> lech- Go נָ֨א <WH4994> na now רְאֵ֜ה <WH7200> re-'Eh I pray thee see אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁל֤וֹם <WH7965> she-Lom whether it be well אַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH251> 'a-Chei-cha with thy brethren וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et שְׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> she-Lom and well הַצֹּ֔אן <WH6629> hatz-Tzon, with the flocks וַהֲשִׁבֵ֖נִי <WH7725> va-ha-shi-Ve-ni again דָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> da-Var; me word וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7971> vai-yish-la-Che-hu So he sent מֵעֵ֣מֶק <WH6010> me-'E-mek him out of the vale חֶבְר֔וֹן <WH2275> chev-Ron, of Hebron וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo and he came שְׁכֶֽמָה׃ <WH7927> she-Che-mah. to Shechem

וַיִּמְצָאֵ֣הוּ <WH4672> vai-yim-tza-'E-hu found him אִ֔ישׁ <WH582> 'Ish, him וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold תֹעֶ֖ה <WH8582> to-'Eh and behold [he was] wandering בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> bas-sa-Deh; in the field וַיִּשְׁאָלֵ֧הוּ <WH7592> vai-yish-'a-Le-hu asked him הָאִ֛ישׁ <WH582> ha-'Ish another לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> le-Mor saying מַה־ <WH4100> mah- What תְּבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <WH1245> te-vak-Kesh. What seekest

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אַחַ֖י <WH251> 'a-Chai my brethren אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I מְבַקֵּ֑שׁ <WH1245> me-vak-Kesh; I seek הַגִּֽידָה־ <WH5046> hag-gi-dah- tell נָּ֣א <WH4994> na please לִ֔י Li, אֵיפֹ֖ה <WH375> 'ei-Foh me I pray thee where הֵ֥ם <WH1992> hem they רֹעִֽים׃ <WH7462> ro-'Im. they feed

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> ha-'Ish And the man נָסְע֣וּ <WH5265> na-se-'U They are departed מִזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> miz-Zeh, hence כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH8085> sha-Ma'-ti for I heard אֹֽמְרִ֔ים <WH559> 'o-me-Rim, them say נֵלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> ne-le-Chah go דֹּתָ֑יְנָה <WH1886> do-Ta-ye-nah; to Dothan וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech went יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> yo-Sef And Joseph אַחַ֣ר <WH310> 'a-Char after אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> 'e-Chav, his brethren וַיִּמְצָאֵ֖ם <WH4672> vai-yim-tza-'Em and found בְּדֹתָֽן׃ <WH1886> be-do-Tan. them in Dothan
